## FormatProvider interface

Format provider used for obtaining some special formats 'placeholders'

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FormatProvider 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [date](./datetime.formatprovider.date.md) | string | Format placeholder for displaying date |
|  [dateTime](./datetime.formatprovider.datetime.md) | string | Format placeholder for displaying date and time |
|  [time](./datetime.formatprovider.time.md) | string | Format placeholder for displaying time |
